eu.trentorise.opendata.josman.org.pegdown.plugins

Interface BlockPluginParser


  • public interface BlockPluginParser
    A parser that provides block parser rules for pegdown. A pegdown plugin should implement this, along with BaseParser or org.pegdown.Parser if it wants to use the pegdown utilities. This interface is intended for use with PegDownPlugins.Builder.withPlugin(Class, Object...), in order for Java plugins to easily be registered with a parser.
